Class Tree

  • java.lang.Object
    • Tree

  • public class Tree
extends java.lang.Object

    Tree Object

    An object to represent the overall family tree. Consists of Family instances which link to people.
    Since:
    2018-12-23
    Author:
    argonboron - Corrie McGregor

        familyID - ID of family they are to be added to.

        Adds a family to a tree.
        Parameters:
        parents - List of parent's names.
        children - List of children's names.
        year - Year of formation.
        married - Whether the parents are married.
        Returns:
